tool.name: GFF3 Color
tool.description: colors gff3 features based on product tags
tool.help:
**What it does** This tool looks through every feature in your input gff3 file, and then based on annotations on that feature (product, notes, etc) coloring rules will determine the color of that feature and add a ``color`` qualifier. Certain of our tools can handle this data (e.g. genome mapper) and will display your genes with color coding. .. raw:: html
